statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM products;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM products WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC, quantity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY price DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 AND description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM products WHERE price < 50 OR quantity >= 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, name, description FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON c.id = pc.category_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT p.name, p.price, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id;
SELECT name, description, price FROM products WHERE quantity >= 10 AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.id, p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, supplier_name, address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM categories WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, description FROM products WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT p.name, s.supplier_name FROM products p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.id = s.id WHERE s.address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%electronics%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.id = c.id WHERE c.id IS NOT NULL AND p.quantity > 0 ORDER BY p.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, description, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 AND price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.name AS supplier_name, s.address FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.product_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%shirt%' OR description LIKE '%clothing%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM Category ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, name, email FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, w.name AS warehouse_name, i.quantity FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT p.name, c.name AS category, w.name AS warehouse FROM Product p INNER JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id INNER JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id INNER JOIN Category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE w.address LIKE '%Street%';

SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id, name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Supplier s INNER JOIN Product p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_id, name HAVING total_products > 5 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product, SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, p.name HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM Product p INNER JOIN Category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY category HAVING avg_price < 50 ORDER BY category ASC;
